entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CLR failure when running `System.Composition.TypedParts` tests #75041
  • Build failure in Microsoft.Extensions.HostFactoryResolver.Tests: xunit.assert 2.4.2 - author primary signature's signing certificate is not trusted by the trust provider #75040
  • ubsan on arm64 detects invalid value Infinity (of type double) converted to int #75037
    8.0.0
  • AV in GetITypeInfoForMT #75035
    7.0.0
  • ubsan detects null this when calling a member function in the GC #75034
  • Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable on Windows #75031
  • [UWP coreclr] Private coreclr repo for UWP builds is no longer mirrored back to GitHub.com #75024
    Future
  • Mono Bionic Android arm64 CI failure - Failed to get device's property SupportedArchitectures / Device unauthorized / $ADB_VENDOR_KEYS is not set #75022
  • Bionic Android Mono CI failure in System.IO.Pipes named pipes unix domain socket tests (server and client) #75021
  • WASM CI failure in `DebuggerTests.BreakpointTests.ConditionalBreakpoint2` #75020
  • WASM CI failure in `DebuggerTests.ArrayTests` `InspectGenericTypeArrayLocals` and `InspectGenericValueTypeArrayLocals` #75019
  • WASM CI failure in `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.InspectThisThatInheritsFromClassNonUserCode` #75018
  • Add mobile configurations to WasmBuildTests and rename it to something more generic #75015
    8.0.0
  • WASM CI failure in `DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests.InheritedAndPrivateMembersInAClass` #75013
  • [QUIC] Source generators for interop calls #75009
    8.0.0
  • Mono Bionic CI failure in NegotiateAuthenticationKerberosTest `Invalid_Token` and `Loopback_Success` tests #75008
  • CI failure in OSX x64 release NativeAOT SmokeTests SharedLibrary.sh #75005
  • Add more granular pipelines for mobile configurations #75002
    8.0.0
  • Can Single and Double BinaryPrimitives methods be added to nuget packages that target .NET Standard 2.0? #75000
  • [API Proposal]: Add Constructors to Initialize AsyncLocal<T> to Specified Initial Value #74997
  • PrincipalContext.ValidateCredentials for PIN not Password #74992
  • blazor wasm and efcorepreview 7 SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 ver 2.1.0 and 2.1.1 preview fails in runtime #74988
  • Inconsistent result between standard numeric formatting and Math.Round() #74979

Closed

  • System.Collections.Sort<BigStruct>.LinqQuery has regressed on all configs except Windows 64 bit #66776
    8.0.0
  • Fix System.Text.Json source code annotation RequiresUnreferencedCodeAttribute by moving it to class level #67536
    Future
  • Api proposal: Change JsonSerializerOptions default settings #31094
    Future
  • System.Text.Json support to System.Runtime.Serialization #29975
    Future
  • [wasm] `Wasm.Build.Tests` failing with `Generator 'JSExportGenerator' failed to initialize`.. `FileNotFoundException`.. `Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration` #74944
  • Improve JsonNumber performance #30454
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json] A class level attribute that configures the serialization options. #36671
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.IO #72406
    7.0.0
  • Blocking Issue: System.Text.Json and non-public members #31511
    Future
  • BackgroundService appears to create tasks that will never complete #36380
    Future
  • public abstract partial class JsonConverter<T> should not hide TypeToConvert #63898
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'block->bbNatLoopNum == loopNum' during 'Optimize Valnum CSEs' #74739
    8.0.0
  • [System.Net.Http.Json] HttpRequestException is not thrown by HttpClient.GetFromJsonAsync when recieving a 204 No Content Response #63037
    Future
  • [JsonSerializer] Provide option to specify a custom default value for a type, property, or field #36236
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json] Allow ReferenceResolver to feed external references to serializer #42163
    Future
  • System.Threading.Ratelimiting does not effectively maximize requests for its parameters #74056
    7.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Why does converters seem to not provide the name to serialize to? #36761
    Future
  • System.Text.Json uses strings to identify System.Collections.Immutable types #51745
    Future
  • ./src/tests/run.sh fails to run #74866
  • Blazor Wasm - Size regression in System.Text.Json.dll #51311
    Future
  • strange Constructor behavior under last version #73319
    Future
  • Math.Round() produces unexpected results #74912
  • Native build on s390x broken after PR #72394 #74102
  • Support the Specified convention for serializing and deserializing in System.Text.Json #40395
    Future
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-rc.1.22413.1] When calling Socket.EndReceiveFrom method throws SocketException in .NET 7.0 but throws ObjectDisposedException in .NET 6.0 #73936
    7.0.0
  • System.IO Binary Reader ReadChars method behaves differently on net6 #74917
  • High CPU usage in docker when service is not doing anything #73361
    Future
  • API Boolean ToLowerCaseString #45450
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/x86: 16 Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Xml #74013
    7.0.0
  • Event log file is full #73303
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows 10.0.25094/arm64 : Regressions in MicroBenchmarks.Serializers.Xml_ToStream<MyEventsListerViewModel> on 8/13/2022 7:28:42 AM #74439
    Future
  • matrix4x4createfromaxisangletest failing on NativeAOT #72149
    7.0.0
  • testhost missing host files when building with different libraries and host configurations #73777
    8.0.0
  • LazyInitializer: Is it possible to safely reset or re-initialize its value? #49337
    Future
  • System.Net.WebSockets doesn't allow setting of socket options in any way. #23183
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `Then` or `ContinueWithResult` extension method for `Task` #58692
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add time properties to CancellationToken #59312
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Get period from PeriodicTimer #74716
  • TarWriter allows to write invalid link entries that are unable to extract #74887
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test mode that scans JIT disassembly output #75039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure regions never use more than 99% of the heap hard limit #75038
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #75036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change LibrariesConfiguration defaults in tests #75033
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Update docs for renamed type parameters #75032
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [release/7.0] Add support so that SDK6 will continue to get the latest ILC packages #75030
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix undefined behavior issues in aarch64 #75029
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use the correct runtime pack version when the workload is not installed #75028
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Perf][Maui] Quick fix for current Maui net6.0 runs. #75027
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Fix NCL stress tests after ProductVersion upgrade #75026
    area-System.Net
  • Avoid allocations in ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync in the common case #75025
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Tar: Fix buffer is too small error when writing Prefix on large filenames #75023
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0] Throw on incompatible WebSocket options #75014
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • New ASCII APIs #75012
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Simplify installer build by using step container targets #75011
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [mono] Enable a bunch of System.Net tests on Windows #75010
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] CI: Trigger wasm jobs on some specific libraries #75007
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/7.0] Fix argument validation in RuntimeType.InvokeMember #75006
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Don't try to build PGO tools on platforms with no CoreCLR port. #75003
    area-Infrastructure-mono, arch-s390x
  • JIT: Mark an F# test as GC stress incompatible #75001
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disable TYP_BLK stressing for tail call to loop optimization #74999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump LLVM to unversioned OSX package names #74996
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove unnecessary LoaderHeap asserts #74995
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • System.Net.Requests: Pick correct RemoteExecutor overload in test #74994
    area-System.Net
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/7.0] [mono][jit] Zero extend the return when we might be invoking llvm generated code #74991
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Rewrite interop in debugger tests #74990
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix SharedLibrary smoke test build on osx-arm64 #74989
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make the JsonSerializerOptions.MemberAccessorStrategy property static. #74986
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Improve diagnostics when allocating MsQuicApi #74985
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use ConfigureAwait(false) #74982
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder: Fix complex types in constructors #74981
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Delete a few dead NetworkInformation helpers #74976
    area-System.Net
  • Exclude segment_standby_list from regions #74975
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Make System.Transactions.Local trimmable #75004
    area-System.Transactions, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [ARM64] - `IsValidCompareChain` should return `false` if both operands are not integral types #75016
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support so that SDK6 will continue to get the latest ILC packages #75017
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix argument validation in RuntimeType.InvokeMember #74998
    area-System.Reflection
  • [ARM64] - `IsValidCompareChain` should return `false` if both operands are not integral types #74853
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Throw on incompatible WebSocket options #74473
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix issue #74741 - assert failure during weak pointer scanning. #74894
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [NativeAOT] Save full ARM64 SIMD arg registers in UniversalTransition #74958
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix buffer overruns in GC code #74974
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Ensure that the SSE fallback for Vector3.Dot masks off the unused element of op1 and op2 #74980
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: assign plausible loop number to new throw helper blocks #74978
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add WaitAsync functionality to Background Service #74789
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [RateLimiting] Handle Timer jitter #74360
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Disallow TarWriter from writing link entries without LinkName set #74939
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0] Change some exception types thrown in Tar APIs #74893
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0] Turn in-build signing on #74941
  • [release/7.0] Only attempt to use ESRP connection in approved branches #74942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Don't try to build PGO tools on platforms with no CoreCLR port. #74147
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, arch-s390x, arch-ppc64le
  • Ensure Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration ships #74943
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix inclusion for tests/run.sh (#74866) #74875
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid a crash when the debugger code fails to lookup the signature #74957
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix GetTempFileName() on Windows #74855
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Zero extend the return when we might be invoking llvm generated code #74796
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Revert "Unload MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources. (#74749)" #74984
    area-System.Net
  • Ensure that the SSE fallback for Vector3.Dot masks off the unused element of op1 and op2 #74932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix testhost build with different libraries and host configurations #74903
    area-Host
  • Fix buffer overruns in GC code #74847
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disallow TarWriter from writing link entries without LinkName set #74892
    area-System.IO
  • Change some exception types thrown in Tar APIs #74845
    area-System.IO
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Fix `JSExport` on struct and records #74890
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Use the register of CAST for contained index operator #74275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Stage spmi aspnet collection through the repo artifacts dir #74879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Preference sources of copy-like casts to destinations #74777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix `fgNoStructParamPromotion` #74807
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Do not retype small locals in `FIELD_LIST`s on x86 #74030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add missing documentation to System.Net.Quic and System.Net.WebSockets #74945
    area-System.Net
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: local assertion prop and redundant zeroing #74967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Simplify JitDisasm matching behavior #74430
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding zmmStateSupport and AVX512F, AVX512CD, AVX512BW, AVX512DQ and AVX512VL ISAs. #74113
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use Roslyn compiler with RefSafetyRulesAttribute support #74883
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove XmlConvert.StrEqual and use Span<char>.StartsWith() instead. #74955
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • add ability to set GCName via runtimeconfig. #74831
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][llvm] Disable simd intrinsics when we might be interoping between jit and llvmaot #74797
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [QUIC] Fix native crashes and heap corruption via "generated-like" interop #74669
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Reuse more Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration code in JS generators #74949
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator
  • [release/7.0] Unload MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources. #74931
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net
  • Encode UserName value in UriBuilder (Issue #74662) #74953
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add local build for System.Globalization shim #72896
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Release/7.0] Updating inbox source generators to Roslyn 4.4 and removing polyfill approach #74822
    area-Meta
  • [SocketException]: New Constructor with string? for SocketException #74744
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Prevent pooled byte buffer writer index from overflowing #74511
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add nullability annotation on CacheControlHeaderValue #74863
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • PGO: Add new tiers #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Delete `lvPromotedStruct` #74702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fold SIMD-typed partial access to locals; delete base types from vector constants #74580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Floor and Ceiling intrinsics for amd64 #74936
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Allocate string literals on frozen segments #49576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add intrinsic for IndexOfAny on Arm64 #74010
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add a few more riscv64 stubs in PAL #74793
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Enhance metrics reported by superpmi diffs #74584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Improve the performance of EqualsAll for Arm64 with LLVM as backend #74574
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix OP_CHECK_THIS to read 1 byte instead of 4/8 on x86/x64/LLVM. #74762
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [Mono] Fix Mono Windows x86 build and runtime crash. #74639
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, runtime-mono, 8.0.0
  • [No Review, WIP] Consume ApiCompat's ValidateAssemblies task #73263
    NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
